description: Try our easy to follow Barbecue Pork Ribs with Asian Coleslaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Barbecue Pork Ribs with Asian Coleslaw
name: Barbecue Pork Ribs with Asian Coleslaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make coleslaw, combine cabbage, carrot, capsicum, bean sprouts, mint and dressing in a large bowl. Toss until well combined. Serve with Asian coleslaw and bread rolls.
